Html:
Hey all,

Do you think this could be adapted into a sharepoint feature, maybe entering the C# directly into a workflow to parse information in an email sent to a sharepoint list to pre defined columns in that list?

Im not really a developer but if anybody could point me in the direction to start this i will give it a go.

I don't see why not.  You may have to create a custom workflow activity, but there's no reason why this logic couldn't be included in a web part.

J
